text: رَبَّنَا وَأَدۡخِلۡهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدتَّهُمۡ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمۡۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

translation.en: Our Lord, and admit them to gardens of perpetual residence which You have promised them and whoever was righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their offspring. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise
translation.id: Ya Tuhan kami, masukkanlah mereka ke dalam surga 'Adn yang telah Engkau janjikan kepada mereka, dan orang yang saleh di antara nenek moyang mereka, istri-istri, dan keturunan mereka. Sungguh, Engkaulah Yang Mahaperkasa, Mahabijaksana
